access_key_id.description: The access key ID to access the S3 bucket. Airbyte requires Read and Write permissions to the given bucket. Read more here.
access_key_id.title: S3 Key ID

secret_access_key.description: The corresponding secret to the access key ID. Read more here
secret_access_key.title: S3 Access Key

s3_bucket_name.description: The name of the S3 bucket. Read more here.
s3_bucket_name.title: S3 Bucket Name

s3_bucket_region.description: The region of the S3 bucket. See here for all region codes.
s3_bucket_region.title: S3 Bucket Region

s3_endpoint.description: Your S3 endpoint url. Read more here
s3_endpoint.title: S3 Endpoint

server_uri.description: The URI of the Nessie server, required to establish a connection.
server_uri.title: Nessie Server URI

access_token.description: Optional token for authenticating with the Nessie server.
access_token.title: Nessie Access Token

warehouse_location.description: The location of the data warehouse associated with the Nessie repository.
warehouse_location.title: Nessie Warehouse Location

main_branch_name.description: The name of the main branch in the Nessie repository.
main_branch_name.title: Nessie Main Branch Name
